message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am interested in purchasing the product for $10000.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $11500.
Thank you for your response, Alice. While I appreciate your offer, I would like to stick to my original proposal of $10000. I believe this is a fair price for the product.
